CustomField.description: Code denoting whether this business is a single location, a corporate or subsidiary headquarters location, or a branch location. 0 = single location, 1 = headquarters location, 2 = branch location, and 9 = unknown
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Code denoting whether this business is a single location, a corporate or subsidiary headquarters location, or a branch location.
CustomField.label: Headquarters Branch Code
